content.heading: Partnership Vision
content.body: TEEI partners with AWS to deliver world-class cloud-based educational resources to underserved communities worldwide. By leveraging AWS infrastructure, we can scale our impact and reach students who need it most.
highlights: 99.9% uptime ensuring continuous access to education

content.name: Digital Learning Platform
content.description: AWS-powered cloud infrastructure delivering educational content to remote communities

content.name: Teacher Training Initiative
content.description: Professional development program equipping educators with modern cloud-based teaching tools

content.name: STEM Excellence Program
content.description: Advanced computer science curriculum hosted on AWS infrastructure

content.quote: This partnership has transformed our ability to serve students in the most remote regions. AWS infrastructure ensures our content reaches everyone.
content.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
content.title: Program Director, TEEI

content.quote: The cloud-based platform is reliable, scalable, and has enabled us to multiply our impact by 10x in just two years.
content.author: Michael Chen
content.title: Technology Director, TEEI

content.heading: Join Us in Making a Difference
content.body: Together, we can reach 100,000 students by 2026. Partner with TEEI to transform educational outcomes globally.

routing.reason: World-class partnership document requires human oversight, brand compliance, and full QA validation
